Text: Thanks Bigfish any chance you could upload season 2 complete

Thanks so much bigfish - we get rubbish reception in East Melbourne, so we watch your uploads of MKR the following night... WITH NO ADDS !!!!! :) 

Can I ask what program(s) you use to 
- cut the adds out
- re-encode ~50 mins TV to 700 MB avi
Ads are removed using VideoRedo mpeg editor, encoded using MEGUI with custom settings. Handbrake may be easier encoding for beginners
